name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-datatable
title: Data Table Web Part
shortDescription: This web part provides easy way to render SharePoint custom list in data table view with all the necessary features.
longDescription: This web part provides easy way to render SharePoint custom list in data table view with all the necessary features.

metadata.value: PropertyFieldColorPicker, PropertyFieldListPicker, PropertyFieldMultiSelect, PropertyFieldOrder, WebPartTitle, Placeholder

thumbnails.alt: Demo of the web part in action

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
